body_html:
Note that if you are using docker file from the pytorch git repo, the dockerfile could ONLY be run without error when you:

  1. git clone the pytorch repo
  2. run docker build -t pytorch . in the pytorch directory.
body_text:
Note that if you are using docker file from the pytorch git repo, the dockerfile could ONLY be run without error when you:

git clone the pytorch repo
run docker build -t pytorch . in the pytorch directory.
body:
Note that if you are using docker file from the pytorch git repo, the dockerfile could ONLY be run without error when you:

1. git clone the pytorch repo
2. run docker build -t pytorch . in the pytorch directory.
